The movies shown below show epilogos for selected regions of the human genome, across 127 epigenomes.
The speed of the movies is inversely proportional to the level of surprisal (or amount of information) encountered at each position.
Labels are added to indicate the nature of highly surprising regions.



These data are provided as-is, and a manuscript is in preparation.
Please contact Wouter Meuleman (last name @ mit dot edu) for comments and suggestions. Thanks!
